content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 26 Sep 2018I am aspiring to be an entrepreneur after immediately after NS. What are some resources for people like me that we can dig on?Our time horizon is short. I want to do something interesting and value adding.5 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (5)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 26 Sep 2018Really depend on what business you interested to do.​Can start with competitor research, and estimated your costs, capital required.​0 comments1

Joash Chua, Financial Consultant at IPP Financial Advisers Pte. Ltd. Level 3. WonderkidAnswered on 30 Oct 2018Almost all successful entrepreneurs we see today have real working experience under their belt. Everyone aspires to be someone, but not everyone will BE someone. If you knew what goes on in the life of an entrepreneur, you might just have second thoughts.After all, entrepreneurs are businessmen and you can't run a business if you have never learnt how business is conducted. Go out there and get some working experience and find a mentor. 0 comments0

Kenichi Xi, nᴉʍ oʇ dǝnᴉʇsǝd 不能说的秘密 at Tag Team with Gabriel ThamLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 Sep 2018Do not rush into starting a Business if you do not have the skills or experiences.​Is easy to start a Business but is hard to maintain a profitable business.​You should start working in the sector in the business you are interested in and see whether is suitable for you and whether the future growth is there.​That will lower any setback and allows you to gain income and experiences that can bring your future Business afar if is suitable for you.​
Hope my reply helps.If you feel this reply have Quality, please upvote and check other Quality Reply.https://seedly.sg/profile/a-kenichi-xiThank you.0 comments0

Jeff Yeo,   amateur Social contributor  at School of social sharingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 Sep 2018Singapore is a good location for new start ups. Try looking to EDB, Spring to get Gov support.  There are also communities and mentors you can tap on​​Take a read herehereHere​good luck !0 comments0

Jay Liu, Sleepyhead at Land of Dreams Level 6. MasterAnswered on 27 Sep 2018Read books on entrepreneurship, leadership, marketing etc. Set a goal 1 bite at a time. Execute promptly, don't hesitate, don't be afraid to fail. But of cos on your own due diligence. 0 comments0
